pageContext.claim: “It will probably, unfortunately [coronavirus], get worse before it gets better -- something I don't like saying about things, but that's the way it is. It's the way -- it's what we have. If you look over the world, it's all over the world, and it tends to do that.”
pageContext.analysis: This is not always true. Although the virus does seem to  come in waves, some countries, like New Zealand, have been able to eradicate the virus entirely, without a huge, continual spike in cases.
